DOC.brief_title: IMPACT Non Hodgkins Lymphoma ( NHL ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , international observational study subject receive CHOP-14 CHOP-21 ( without Rituximab ) treatment NHL . Approximately 100-150 site contribute information subject treat institution . To avoid geographical bias , sit select represent spread subject country . Each site initially limit 5 retrospective subject 10 prospective subject ( 15 subject per site ) sit may ask contribute subject approximately 10 retrospective subject 20 prospective subject . Retrospective subject may include subject complete cycle chemotherapy treatment prior date site initiation . Prospective subject may consider study subject plan CHOP-14 CHOP-21 ( without Rituximab ) treatment site initiation visit .
DOC.criteria: Subjects great equal 18 year old Subjects diagnose histological type NHL ( include chemotherapy na√Øve pretreated subject ) Subjects plan receive minimum 3 cycle CHOP14 CHOP21 without Rituximab ( subject enrol retrospectively , eligibility assess profile time planning treatment , treatment initiate 01 Jan 2005 , specific focus plan chemotherapy outcome number deliver cycle ) Before studyspecific procedure , appropriate write informed consent must obtain country require Subjects receive CHOEP ( ( CHOP = Cytoxan , Hydroxyrubicin ( Adriamycin ) , Oncovin ( Vincristine ) , Etoposide , Prednisone Chemotherapy ) CNOP ( Cytoxan , Novantrone , Oncovin ( Vincristine ) , Etoposide , Prednisone ) chemotherapy eligible inclusion study
